category: Radio: Unique Travel Preferences - Lily and Strangers
word: Bonjour. Je m'appelle Alice. Je suis jeune et je suis étudiante.
meaning: Hello. My name is Alice. I am young and I am a student.

meaning: My brother is fifteen years old.

word: Il est brun et très gentil.

category: Radio: Unique Travel Preferences - Lily and Strangers
word: Nous aimons beaucoup les vacances et les voyages.
meaning: We really like holidays and travel.

category: Radio: Morning Routine - Late Nights with Lin
word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Léo. Je viens du Brésil.
meaning: Hello, my name is Léo. I come from Brazil.

category: Radio: Morning Routine - Late Nights with Lin
word: Tous les jours je parle anglais avec mes amis.
meaning: Every day I speak English with my friends.

category: Radio: Morning Routine - Late Nights with Lin
word: Ils viennent aussi de France et nous parlons du cinéma.
meaning: They also come from France and we are talking about cinema.

word: Nous sommes jeunes et aimons parlait beaucoup.
meaning: We are young and like to talk a lot.

category: Radio: Morning Routine - Late Nights with Lin
meaning: I want to speak French too.

meaning: Hello, Marie. How old are you?

meaning: Hi, Leo. I am twelve years old.
